articles.title: Barbie Hsu's mother's reaction to the actress marrying former boyfriend: 'I was kept in the dark' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: When asked if she would meet Hsu's new husband, Huang Chunmei replied, “It all depends if I’m feeling up to it at the time. Whether I want to see him, wait until the time comes, then we’ll talk.”
articles.content: Following the surprise announcement on Tuesday (Mar 8) that Taiwanese actress Barbie Hsu is now married to her ex-boyfriend, South Korean musician DJ Koo Jun-yup, her mother has spoken up about her f… [+2025 chars]

articles.title: Ed Sheeran sings, says he wants to clear his name at copyright trial - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: On his second day of questioning, Sheeran sang the "Oh I" hook from Shape Of You and lines from songs including Nina Simone's Feeling Good in the same key to show how melodies can sound alike.
articles.content:
British chart-topper Ed Sheeran sang part of his 2017 mega hit Shape Of You in court on Tuesday (Mar 8) in a copyright trial over the song, and said melodies can sound similar without being copied.
… [+2886 chars]

articles.title: Want to learn Korean? K-pop stars Blackpink can help you with that - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Blackpink In Your Korean is a set of teaching materials that helps users pick up native expressions and vocabulary through scenario-based learning and conversations with Lisa, Jennie, Jisoo and Rose.
articles.content:
Calling all Blinks across the globe you can now learn Korean from your favourite K-pop group through a teaching package called Blackpink In Your Korean.
The 12-chapter teaching material set follows … [+978 chars]
